scripts.compose: composer require filament/filament firefly/filament-blog joaopaulolndev/filament-edit-profile blade-ui-kit/blade-icons && composer dumpautoload && php artisan migrate
scripts.initialize: php artisan filament:install --panels && php artisan filament-blog:install && php artisan vendor:publish --tag=blade-icons && composer require faisal50x/blade-ionicons codeat3/blade-phosphor-icons troccoli/blade-health-icons codeat3/blade-fluentui-system-icons
